text:
November 30, 1953
To: Program Planning Committee
From: Skornia
HelpI Your reaction and guidance will be greatly
appreciated, and I hope I didn’t take your name in
vain.
In answer to a letter from Graham, containing several
proposals.
Copy of original letter was sent by him to Graydon. My
copy also being shown to Schooley. Secretarial force
several weeks behind now, or I’d have copies made for
the rest of you. I hope my reply gives you an idea
of what is involved.
